# djwr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`djwr` (Data Journalism with R) is a package of tutorials, templates, and support functions for Journalism 301 at CSU, Chico.  

## Installation

You can install the development version of `djwr` like so:

``` r
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("mjfrigard/djwr")
```

## Use

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(djwr)
```
